job_description:
Company: FrontierTech
Position: AI Research Engineer
Location: Pittsburgh, PA (On-site)
Salary: $170,000 - $250,000

About Us:
FrontierTech is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of AI and machine learning. We conduct groundbreaking research to develop innovative technologies.

Job Description:
We are seeking an AI Research Engineer to implement and evaluate novel AI algorithms. You will work on challenging research problems and publish your findings.

Responsibilities:
- Implement and evaluate novel AI algorithms
- Write research papers and present findings at conferences
- Collaborate with other researchers
- Contribute to open-source AI libraries

Requirements:
- PhD in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related field
- Strong programming skills in Python
- Experience with deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Publications in top AI conferences

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with reinforcement learning
- Experience with natural language processing

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunity to work on cutting-edge research
- Collaborative and supportive work environment
